pr_title: Add numerical comparison and equality expression support

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'incremental-parser' of https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang into incremental-parser

 Conflicts:
	compiler/ballerina-parser/src/main/java/io/ballerinalang/compiler/internal/parser/tree/SyntaxKind.java

timeline.bodyText: Shall we rename this to NOT_EQUAL and NOT_DOUBLE_EQUAL?
timeline.author: SupunS
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -77,12 +77,16 @@
     PERCENT_TOKEN(556, "%"),
     ASTERISK_TOKEN(557, "*"),
     LT_TOKEN(558, "<"),
-    EQUAL_LT_TOKEN(559, "<="),
+    LT_EQUAL_TOKEN(559, "<="),
     GT_TOKEN(560, ">"),
     EQUAL_GT_TOKEN(561, "=>"),
     QUESTION_MARK_TOKEN(562, "?"),
     PIPE_TOKEN(563, "|"),
-
+    GT_EQUAL_TOKEN(564, ">="),
+    EXCLAMATION_MARK_TOKEN(565, "!"),
+    EM_EQUAL_TOKEN(566, "!="),
+    EM_DOUBLE_EQUAL_TOKEN(567, "!=="),

timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: I have added it below. so this case was removed.
replies.author: lochana-chathura

timeline.message: Change NOT_EQUAL and NOT_DOUBLE_EQUAL token names
